campaigns.name: Adventure in the CDA
campaigns.description: A campaign in a cyberpunk universe where players navigate between the real world and the CDA.
campaigns.context: A dystopian future where technology and virtual reality dominate.

campaigns.name: The Mysteries of the Kingdom
campaigns.description: A medieval fantasy campaign full of magic, mythological creatures, and mysteries to solve.
campaigns.context: A magical kingdom where adventurers explore dungeons and face supernatural creatures.

campaigns.name: Space Wars: Galactic Conquest
campaigns.description: In a vast galaxy, players take on the role of military commanders fighting for control of key planets.
campaigns.context: A futuristic galaxy at war with advanced technology, starships, and alien species.

campaigns.name: Pirates of the Lost Seas
campaigns.description: A pirate-themed campaign where players search for a legendary treasure hidden on a mythical island.
campaigns.context: A world of pirate ships, treasure hunting, and battles on the high seas.

campaigns.name: Adventure in the CDDDDDDDDDA
campaigns.description: A campaign in a cyberpunk universe where players navigate between the real world and the CDA.
campaigns.context: A dystopian future where technology and virtual reality dominate.

campaigns.name: The rise of the Kingdom
campaigns.context: A king wants to have it all

campaigns.name: A path to CDA
campaigns.description: A long journey to become a dev
campaigns.context: Post-apocalyptic background for a team of dev warriors. 18months to go

campaigns.name: Les Brumes d'Altharion
campaigns.description: Une mystérieuse brume recouvre le royaume d'Altharion, isolant les villages et rendant les routes dangereuses. Une ancienne prophétie semble liée à ces événements, et seuls les plus courageux pourront percer ce mystère.
campaigns.context: Les héros doivent enquêter sur l'origine de la brume et découvrir ce qui se cache derrière les légendes d'un ancien artefact oublié.

campaigns.name: CyberRévolte : 2099
campaigns.description:
En 2099, les mégacorporations contrôlent tout. Une équipe de mercenaires rebelles s'élève contre le système pour dévoiler des secrets qui pourraient changer le monde.
Universe
campaigns.context: Les personnages sont embauchés pour infiltrer une base de données sécurisée, mais ils découvrent des informations compromettantes sur une expérience illégale.

campaigns.name: Les Sables d'Ankharis
campaigns.description: Une cité perdue dans les sables d'un désert infini abrite une relique sacrée qui pourrait détruire ou sauver le monde. Les aventuriers doivent naviguer entre factions rivales pour atteindre leur objectif.

campaigns.name: Terres Dévastées : L'Éveil des Cendres
campaigns.description: Dans un monde ravagé par une guerre nucléaire, les survivants se battent pour la survie. Des rumeurs parlent d’un bunker intact contenant des ressources et des technologies oubliées qui pourraient rebâtir la civilisation... ou la détruire définitivement.
campaigns.context: Les personnages sont un groupe hétéroclite de survivants qui doivent traverser un désert irradié, affronter des factions hostiles et percer les secrets du bunker.

quests.name: Network Infiltration
quests.description: Infiltrate the data network of a corrupt corporation to obtain sensitive information.

quests.name: Saved by Technology
quests.description: Use technology to rescue an ally trapped in a defective virtual reality.

quests.name: Street Espionage
quests.description: Monitor a street filled with hackers and security agents.

quests.name: The Secret of the Ancients
quests.description: Uncover the mysterious origin of an ancient artifact that could change the course of history.

quests.name: Beast Hunter
quests.description: Hunt down a werewolf terrorizing nearby villages.

quests.name: Conquest of the Red Planet
quests.description: Establish control over the Red Planet and defend it against enemy forces.

quests.name: Alien Negotiations
quests.description: Negotiate a peace treaty with the alien species to avoid war.

quests.name: The Treasure Map
quests.description: Follow the clues on an ancient treasure map to find the legendary treasure.

quests.name: Sea Battle
quests.description: Engage in a battle with rival pirate ships over treasure.

quests.name: Adventure in the CDDDDDDDDDA
quests.description: A campaign in a cyberpunk universe where players navigate between the real world and the CDA.
quests.context: A dystopian future where technology and virtual reality dominate.
